game.name: Wayside Marina
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Custom Volume Controls, Keyboard Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Stereo Sound, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Wayside Marina is a melee based, dungeon adventure. Explore the outposts and the grottos beyond the horizon, uncovering mysteries that threaten your world on the surface. And helping the eclectic mariners you meet along the way.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Wayside Marina is a melee based, dungeon adventure. Explore the outposts and the grottos beyond the horizon, uncovering mysteries that threaten your world on the surface. And helping the eclectic mariners you meet along the way.
